swamp.description: Flat land, water flooded, with dense vegetation. Watch your steps.

dry.description: Dry season in the Swamp lasts six months. There is almost no rain at all. It is warm during the day, but cool at night.

wet.description: Wet season in the Swamp lasts six months. This is the warm period. Afternoon showers are common, and the bush is lush.

enable_egg_spot.description: Calls a goblin to lay an egg

before_chosing_banner.title: It is time
before_chosing_banner.message:
No need to wait any longer, the shaman is ready, and we are all set.
Let's pick our banner.

toys.description: This is what happens when goblins are asked to bring their own stuff
toys.tooltip: Hands full of weapons, belly full of food, and pockets full of money.

nature.description: Balancing yourself with nature can be hard sometimes, this should help.
nature.tooltip: Basic materials from the start, should you need them all.

sticky_water.tooltip: Eww! I hate going in this muddy water.

firefly_clan.long_description: Living in the swamp as a shamanistic tribe setup. This way of living has given them a perception on life, that are a bit different than their greenskinned cousins.

foggy.description:
A cover of fog crawls across the landscape, hiding untold mysteries.
  • Vision radius is greatly reduced.

firefly_confusion.description: A firefly cloud blinds and confuses the enemy

fern_helmet.description: Avoids heating your head under the sun

goblin_aura.description: Protection granted by the Spirit Walker

full_leather_helmet.description: More protection than other leather helmet

curtains_door.description: A larger door. It makes quite an impression.

big_firefly_essense.description: Has the equivalent of 8 small firefly essence bottles. Glow in the dark
big_firefly_essense.flavor: Can be harvested back to 8 bottles later

certificate.flavor: Could be from a promotion, or from winning a spit competition, anything is valid

fiber_rug.description: A blend of fibers are woven tightly by hand, for whatever foot traffic comes its way.

hourglass.description: A funny shaped glass with sand inside, draining from one end to the other
hourglass.flavor: It is not my turn to flip it!

goblin_large_totem.description: Commemorative totem, resembling someone from the clan
goblin_large_totem.flavor: Don't worry, it is not made from real skulls, just white paint

goblin_small_totem.description: Commemorative totem, resembling someone from the clan
goblin_small_totem.flavor: Don't worry, it is not made from real skulls, just white paint

pole_banner.description: A banner with the clan colors, raised high so everyone can see it
pole_banner.flavor: Military units will consider this on their patrol path

potted_cattail.description: Natural from the swamp biome, now for your home
potted_cattail.flavor: Hey, can you water my plants while I'm away?

potted_giple.description: Natural from the swamp biome, now for your home
potted_giple.flavor: Hey, can you water my plants while I'm away?

goblin.description: A sign with a goblin face

varanus.description: A sign with a varanus face

windchime.flavor: A different melody plays as the wind changes

window_box_wood.description: A tidy home for the plant.

plate_of_ferns.flavor: Uses ingredients found in the Swamp Biome

plate_of_mushrooms.flavor: Uses ingredients found in the Swamp Biome

hammock.description: To sleep far from the ground

mush_chair.description: You can sit on it. Very soft.

mush_table.description: A table, for table things. A little wobbly.

baby.description: Will grow into a fully goblin soon

camp_standard.description: How you know you've come home

goblin_camp_standard.description: How you know you've come home
goblin_camp_standard.town_bonus_description:
This settlement will grow strong through our muscles and spirits.
  • Mining gives 50% more Ore, Stone, and Clay
  • Goblins no longer mind cramped spaces

varanus_camp_standard.description: How you know you've come home
varanus_camp_standard.town_bonus_description:
This settlement shall be at one with the environment.
  • Trees produce 25% more Wood
  • Plants and Crops both grow 25% faster
  • Plants have 2x their normal Appeal

goblinpedia.flavor: Use this item to open an actual encyclopedia with all the necessary information about the Firefly Clan and the Swamp Biome. After your learning session you can simple use it as a nice decoration

bear.description: Big and fast, a little muddy, yet fluffy

cattail.description: This plant's fiber can be spun into thread.
cattail.unripe_description: This plant has been harvested and has not grown back yet

seed.description: The small seeds of a big plant

sprout.description: Just needs some time and care.

fern.description: Harvestable for a meager food supply.
fern.unripe_description: This plant has been harvested and has not grown back yet

giant_flower.description: Can be harvested for healing herbs
giant_flower.unripe_description: This plant has been harvested and has not grown back yet

seed.description: The small seeds of a giant flower

sprout.description: Just needs some time and care.

mushroom.description: Harvestable for a meager food supply.
mushroom.unripe_description: This plant has been harvested and has not grown back yet

seed.description: Little pieces from a bigger mushroom

sprout.description: Just needs some time and care.

lilypad.description: Floats and can hold up a lot of weight

giant_flower.description: An herb commonly used for medicinal purposes

big_g.description: Beloved and playful, helped his generation through tough times

big_wolf.description: Playful with allies, a beast for the enemies.

seed.description: Plantable to grow a bogger tree
Plantable to grow a cypress tree

skull_basher.description: Try to aim it at enemies head

shaman_description.description: Takes care of the clan well-being, crafting them armors, potions and food

shaman_workbench.description: Shamans will use to craft their stuff

shaman_firefly_token.description: Shamans will use this to extract firefly essences

dreamcatcher_talisman.description: Helps with magic. Don't let your dreams be dreams.

egg_pedestal.description: Used to lay eggs and take care of it

spirit_walker_description.description: Healer, summons spirits to help in fights

level_1_data.perk_000_description: Can heal in small amounts the health of allies

level_2_data.perk_000_description: Summons a goblin spirit that will help in fights

level_3_data.perk_000_description: Summons multiple goblin spirits, the amount based on the summoner spirit stat

level_4_data.perk_000_description: Summons the beloved and playful goblin Big G. He helped his generation through tough times ages ago.

level_5_data.perk_000_description: All your Warriors will now be shielded by a defensive aura

level_6_data.perk_000_description: With the combined power of a (max level) Beast Tamer, they summon an ancient Dragon Spirit into battle

spirit_walker_staff_talisman.flavor: Promotes a goblin to Spirit Walker

warrior_description.description: Pride in fighting. Warriors are the ones to use heavy weapons and wear armor.

level_1_data.perk_000_description: The basics are learned, gaining courage and increasing stamina

level_2_data.perk_000_description: Performs a Spin Attack that hits everyone around.

level_3_data.perk_000_description: Hits enemies far away with darts, poisoning them.

level_4_data.perk_000_description: Tougher skin for a faster health regeneration.

level_5_data.perk_000_description: Strength aquired from past fights grants +1 Body stat

level_6_data.perk_000_description: Stats gets higher the longer a fight lasts.

earthmaster_description.description: Craft advance items and decorations using hard materials like stone and clay

bonesmith_description.description: Crafts basic items with materials like wood and fiber

bonesmith_workbench.description: Only simple tasks should be done here

weaving_table.description: A place to weave armors, even the hard solid ones

beast_tamer_description.description: Summon and order animals into fight

level_1_data.perk_000_description: A group of elite Poyos called the Four Feathers will join and help in the fight

level_2_data.perk_000_description: Summons local fauna wildlife to help in the battle

level_3_data.perk_000_description: Traps enemies, immobilizing them for some time

level_4_data.perk_000_description: Summons a pair of varanus into the fight

level_5_data.perk_000_description: Casts a cloud of fireflies into enemies, confusing and blinding them

level_6_data.perk_000_description:
(Goblins only)
With the combined power of a (max level) Spirit Walker, they summon an ancient Dragon Spirit into battle
level_6_data.perk_001_description:
(Hearthlings only)
Summons a big wolf, one that inspires your allies and scares the enemies.

worker_description.description:
Workers perform basic tasks like harvesting resources, hauling stuff around, and constructing buildings.

⚔️ Goblin workers can also fight and be in a combat party.

cover.title: About goblins and swamps
cover.text: Pick the desired topic to read from the side menu

pedestal.title: Egg Pedestal
pedestal.description1: A nice cerimonial table for an important ocasion
pedestal.text1: The egg pedestal is crafted by the shaman of your clan
pedestal.text2: After placing it, click on it. In the bottom left you will see its buttons. Click on the egg icon.
pedestal.text3: One of your goblins (worker only) will come to this pedestal and lay an egg.

egg.title: Goblin Egg
egg.description1: Who came first, the egg or the goblin?
egg.description2: Many goblins wondered about it for as long as they remember, but no one knows for sure.
egg.description3: The goblins current most acceptable hypotesys is that it was neither. It was a tie.
egg.text1: An egg pedestal is needed first, for a goblin to lay his egg.
egg.text2: After a day, the egg will hatch into a baby goblin.
egg.text3: Watch out, the egg may attract wild animals.

baby.title: Baby Goblin
baby.text1: Eat, sleep, ask for attention, repeat.
baby.text2: Just feed it, a lot. Babies eat 5 times more than adults, so watch your stocks!
baby.text3: One more day and they grow into adult goblins.

goblin.title: Goblin
goblin.text1: Now a fully member of society.
goblin.text2: Can be promoted to Warrior, Shaman, Spirit Walker, Trapper, Beast Tamer, Bonesmith and Earthmaster.
goblin.text3: (With mods, some other jobs may be possible too)
goblin.text4: Different from the green goblins, often associated with trouble, these ones are way more behaved and rooted.

beast_tamer.title: Beast Tamer
beast_tamer.text1: Fighter class, promoted from a Trapper. Can summon animals to fight, from little poyos to giant dragons.
beast_tamer.text2: Aside from summoning animals, they can trap enemies and cast a firefly cloud, blinding and confusing them.
beast_tamer.text3: With the help of a Spirit Walker, they join forces and can summon an ancient dragon spirit.
beast_tamer.text4: Hearthlings can be promoted to it too. Though the Spirit Walker teamwork to summon a dragon is now a solo effort to summon a Big Wolf.
